document_data.name: Nav Rayan Dyrr
document_data.mainbody: '''Nav Rayan Dyrr''' was a very talented scout of [[Bregan D'aerthe]] in the early 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
In [[1313 DR]], Nav Rayan Dyrr was the head scout of a Bregan D'aerthe mission to [[Ched Nasad]] headed by [[Beniago]] and [[Zaknafein Do'Urden]]. They were to follow a [[House Hunzrin]] expedition.
In [[1329 DR]] Nav was secretly among the members of the expedition led by [[Dinin Do'Urden]] against the surface [[elves]] and witnessed [[Drizzt Do'Urden]] killed a child; immediately reported the news to [[Jarlaxle]].
